name: Srinivasa Ramanujan
title: Our Notes
knownFor: Partition Function, Modular Forms, “Taxi Cab Numbers”
contributions: Formulated over 3,900 theorems in number theory, infinite series, continued fractions, and mock modular forms
bio: Ramanujan’s transcendental intuition in number theory continues to influence algorithmic complexity, cryptography, and mathematical modeling — his legacy reminds us of the deep structures underlying computation.
